subject: Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dustin Penner and Joffrey Lupul scored twice for the Anaheim Mighty Ducks, who stayed alive in the Western Conference finals with a victory against the Edmonton Oilers.
snippet: Dustin Penner and Joffrey Lupul scored twice for the Anaheim Mighty Ducks, who stayed alive in the Western Conference finals with a victory against the Edmonton Oilers.
